reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I like the game, my only wish is that it wouldn\'t quit all the time!
reviews.author: reasmom1

reviews.title: Great game!!!
reviews.comment: Best bingo by far have 10 bingo games on my smartphone and this one tops them all
reviews.author: Stephanie Phalen

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Super fun game except always shuts off in the middle of games.
reviews.author: Kimberly Rupp

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This is a great game but i only gave it 3 stars because after 3 games i play, the game shuts down. I have lost alot of credits because it shuts down. If you guys can fix that problem i will give it 5 stars!
reviews.author: Brent Underwood

reviews.title: Love the game
reviews.comment: I just wish it stop turning off while I am on the middle of a game
reviews.author: heather mitchell

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: This game was great until it started to force close just as I would win bingo. So in turn not only did I lose what I would have won but I also lost the cost to play the cards in the first place. I\'ve uninstalled and just reinstalled hopefully that will take care of it. Please fix or I will uninstall for good.
reviews.author: Cat Alourdas

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Mom
reviews.author: Melinda Bayless

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: force closes every now and again.still worth the download though
reviews.author: Aiden G

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: The best
reviews.author: Efrain Contreras

reviews.title: Love it you need to try it
reviews.comment: I can\'t stop playing it
reviews.author: Nadia Davis

reviews.comment: Gigi
reviews.author: Gigi Teo

reviews.title: Enjoyable!
reviews.comment: One of the few bingo games I really enjoy. Easy to keel up and just have fun.
reviews.author: Randy Sims

reviews.title: FUN....FUN...FUN
reviews.comment: GREAT Game!!!! Plays smoothly and all around fun!
reviews.author: Joy Smith

reviews.comment: So far i wish i could play at least 10-15 Games before it stalls......but i only manage to get to the fourth number in the rirst game before it freezes......SO ON THAT NOTE, VERY DISAPPOINTED AND IT NEEDS TO BE FIXED A.S.A.P!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Crystal Leschke

reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
reviews.comment: It keeps freezing and kicking me out during a game. I\'ve lost about 20 credits due to this issue. If it\'s not resolved soon. I\'ll just delete this app.
reviews.author: Janae Barnes

reviews.comment: I had a bingo in game and I didn\'t get it .And that made me very upset\tVery poor.
reviews.author: Linda Cogdill

reviews.title: Fun but buggy
reviews.comment: Somewhere between the 2nd and 5th game played in succession, the game crashes on my Galaxy Note 10.1. Fast paced and enjoyable when it is running
reviews.author: Joe Jensen

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: I keep losing gems because it wants to keep freezing and thenit force closes!!! About to uninstall. Upset that I keep losing coins and gems. Not fair!
reviews.author: Hannah Santangelo

reviews.title: Glitches
reviews.comment: I really like the format of this bingo game but it unfortunately hits upon my biggest pet peeve when it comes to games. In the middle of a game it just quits. Wouldn\'t be so bad if I did not  lose my currency when this happens but I do and it is happening more and more. If this is not soon fixed I will be looking for a different game to play.
reviews.author: Denise dessie

reviews.title: Zeki Tablet  Android Jellybean
reviews.comment: Not too bad so far it seems to me. I have been having some fun with  it.
reviews.author: Sandra Tice
